Category: Mask

Ingredients: Mangifera Indica (Mango) Butter, Ascorbyl Palmitate (Vitamin C), Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Oil, Tuber Magnatum (White Truffle Mushroom) Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E.)

Directions: Complete your entire nighttime skincare regime. Then, gently dab a di

hen, gently dab a dime-size amount of the mask under your eyes and allow it to absorb.
